activities: Dolce is a hotel and resort, so we receive personal information when our customers book a room or when they enter our promotions.  Such information includes: name, e-mail address, postal address, personal interests, telephone number, and credit card information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.’s Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedures
recoursemech: Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.’s Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedures (BBB EU Safe Harbor program)
